attributes.action: The Government should resign and allow for another election
attributes.additional_details:
Public services being run for private gain.
The Brexit shambles.
Cuts to the police and education.
Prison conditions
Unsuitable appointments.
A tawdry bribe to the DUP to stay in power.
Inadequate response to appalling crises: Grenfell Tower/ health service/ sexual harassment
Appallingly cruel welfare reforms.
Insulting inept behaviour of the Foreign Secretary.
Inviting Donald Trump  on a state visit.
For all these reasons the government has completely lost our confidence, it should resign.
attributes.background:
We the undersigned are appalled and disgusted by the performance of the current government. We think its actions are corrupt and incompetent  and it has no mandate. Furthermore, it is bringing shame upon the country and running the risk of creating a devastating crisis.
It should resign.
